name: retrieval_KB1
description: Retrieve documents that are most relevant to query from KB1

args_schema.description: The query to be used for retrieval

args_schema.name: top_k
args_schema.description: The number of documents to retrieve

name: search
description: use Tavily to search the web

args_schema.name: query

name: get_trade_info
description: Get trade information for a stock

args_schema.name: ticker
args_schema.description: The ticker of the stock to get trade information for

args_schema.name: start_date
args_schema.description: The start date of the trade information

args_schema.name: end_date
args_schema.description: The end date of the trade information
